title: Google OAuth Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can successfully authenticate using Google OAuth and are redirected to the onboarding flow if first time.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Select 'Sign in with Google' option
Provide valid Google account credentials
User is authenticated and redirected to the onboarding multi-step flow if new user
User session is established with appropriate user data

title: Magic Link Authentication Email Verification
description: Ensure that users receive a valid magic link for email login and the link verifies user email for authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Submit a valid registered email address for magic link
Magic link email is sent to the user with a valid link
Click the magic link from email
User is authenticated after successful email verification and redirected appropriately

title: Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the system rejects authentication attempts with invalid Google credentials or invalid magic link/email.

steps.description: Attempt to sign in with incorrect Google OAuth credentials
Access is denied with an appropriate error message
Submit an unregistered email for magic link request
User is informed that the email is not recognized and no magic link is sent
Use an expired or tampered magic link to attempt login
Authentication fails and user is prompted to retry login

title: Dashboard Displays Accurate Health Metrics
description: Verify the dashboard shows the latest user health data and visualizations, including weight, sleep, mood, energy and symptoms.

steps.description: Login and navigate to user dashboard
Dashboard displays health overview metrics with accurate values reflecting user data
Recent data visualizations and charts are rendered correctly
Interact with any quick action shortcuts on dashboard (such as check-in or add symptom)
Actions trigger correct navigation and updates

title: Health Tracking Daily Check-In Data Integrity
description: Ensure daily check-ins for metrics including weight, sleep, mood, energy, symptoms, supplements, and medications are recorded, stored, and retrievable without loss or corruption.

steps.description: Login and navigate to health tracking module
Submit daily check-in entries for weight, sleep hours, mood rating, energy levels, symptom descriptions, supplements taken, and medications
Check-in data is accepted and confirmed by the system
Navigate to check-in history page
All submitted check-in data is retrievable and correctly displayed

title: Food Photo Analysis for Ingredient Recognition
description: Test that AI-powered food photo analysis correctly identifies ingredients and provides accurate nutritional breakdowns.

steps.description: Navigate to food analysis page
Upload a variety of clear food photos with known ingredients
System returns detected ingredients with high accuracy
Nutritional content (calories, macros, vitamins) is displayed matching expected values
Upload a photo with mixed or complex food items
System handles complex images and returns reasonable ingredient predictions
Upload an invalid or corrupted image file
System provides clear error handling and prompts user to retry

title: AI-Generated Health Insights Relevance
description: Validate that AI-generated insights are personalized based on user data and provide actionable recommendations.

steps.description: Login and navigate to insights section
Trigger AI insight generation based on current user health data
Insights displayed are relevant to user's health metrics, supplements, and goals
Recommendations are actionable and clearly stated
Request regeneration of specific insight to check system responsiveness
Updated insight is generated and replaces previous one correctly

title: Supplements and Medications Management with Image Recognition
description: Verify supplement and medication tracking supports photo recognition, dosage management, timing schedules, and interaction safety checks.

steps.description: Navigate to supplements management page
Upload photos of supplements and medications
System correctly identifies supplement/medication names and details from images
Enter dosage and timing information for supplements and medications
Input data is accepted and saved accurately
Trigger interaction safety check between current supplements and medications
System presents warnings or confirmations about possible interactions properly
Input invalid or unrecognized supplement photos
System handles errors gracefully, prompting user to retry or manually input data

title: Lab Report and Medical Image Upload and AI Analysis
description: Ensure users can upload PDF lab reports and medical images, which are processed with AI to extract key biomarkers accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to lab reports upload page
Upload valid PDF lab reports
AI extracts relevant biomarkers and displays them to the user
Upload medical images (e.g., X-rays, scans)
System processes images and extracts analysis results appropriately
Upload corrupted or unsupported format files
System returns informative error messages and prevents data corruption

title: Conversational AI Assistant Chat and Voice Query Handling
description: Verify that the conversational AI supports text chat and voice input, providing relevant and helpful health information.

steps.description: Navigate to AI assistant chat interface
Enter a variety of health-related text queries
Assistant responds appropriately with accurate and personalized information
Use voice input feature to ask health queries
Voice recognition works correctly and returns valid responses
Send invalid or ambiguous queries
AI handles queries gracefully by asking for clarification or providing best effort answers

title: Billing and Subscription Management via Stripe
description: Validate subscription purchases, credit acquisitions, and accurate billing integration with Stripe, ensuring user balances update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to billing and subscription page
Initiate a new subscription purchase using valid payment details
Stripe checkout session is created and user is redirected correctly
Complete payment process
User subscription status updates and features unlock as expected
Purchase usage credits and verify balance increments
Credits are correctly reflected in user's account
Simulate Stripe payment failures and webhook errors
System handles errors, provides informative messages, and prevents incorrect state changes

title: Device Integration Data Sync for Fitbit
description: Test automatic synchronization of health data from Fitbit device and refresh data without user intervention.

steps.description: Navigate to device integration page
Authorize integration with Fitbit account
Authorization completes successfully and status is displayed
Trigger manual and automatic data sync events
Data is retrieved from Fitbit API and imported into user health metrics correctly
Simulate Fitbit API downtime or errors
System handles errors gracefully and retries accordingly

title: Push Notification Delivery and User Preference Respect
description: Confirm push notifications and reminders are delivered timely and respect individual user notification settings.

steps.description: Set user preferences for push notifications (enable and disable)
Trigger events that send notifications (e.g., reminder for check-in, subscription renewal)
Notifications are delivered when enabled
No notifications are sent when user has disabled them
Unsubscribe and resubscribe to push notifications
Subscription status updates accordingly and notifications respect current setting

title: Multi-step Onboarding Flow Completes Without Errors
description: Verify that new users can complete all onboarding steps, input physical metrics and health goals, and transition smoothly to dashboard.

steps.description: Complete Google OAuth or Magic Link login as a new user
Navigate through each onboarding step: SignUp, Physical Metrics, Health Goals, Medications, Supplements, Review
Provide valid inputs for all required fields in each step
Each onboarding step transitions correctly without error
At the end of onboarding, user is redirected to the main dashboard

title: Admin Panel User and Ticket Management
description: Check that admin users can view, create, modify, and delete user accounts and support tickets consistent with access controls.

steps.description: Login as admin user
Navigate to Admin Panel
Access user management interface and perform CRUD operations on user accounts
All user management actions succeed and data updates persist
Access support tickets, view details and update ticket status
Ticket management actions work as expected with correct data updates
Attempt admin actions with non-admin user
Access is denied enforcing proper role-based access control

title: Error Handling for API Failures Across Modules
description: Validate that the application gracefully handles API errors across critical modules including authentication, AI analysis, billing, and device sync.

steps.description: Simulate backend API failures such as network errors or server errors in authentication, food analysis, and billing endpoints
Frontend displays meaningful error messages without crashing
Retry failed operations and observe recovery behavior
System recovers and completes operations if possible

title: Profile Management Image Upload Validations
description: Verify that user profile image uploads succeed with valid images and reject invalid files, enforcing size and format constraints.

steps.description: Navigate to profile image upload page
Upload a valid image file within allowed size and format
Image uploads successfully and displays on user profile
Upload an invalid file type (e.g., .exe, corrupted image)
System rejects upload with an appropriate error message
Upload an image exceeding size limits
User receives clear feedback regarding file size limit

title: Credit System Usage and Limits Enforcement
description: Ensure the AI feature credit system tracks usage accurately and enforces daily/monthly limits with appropriate user notifications.

steps.description: Trigger AI feature usage that consumes credits
Credit balance decreases correctly according to feature cost
Attempt to use AI features after exceeding daily or monthly credit limits
System prevents usage and notifies user about limit reached
Purchase additional credits and verify balances update
User is able to use features again once credits are available
